<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}

</MethodEndpoint>



Updates Base Configurations related to a Data Marketplace.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"baseUrl":{"description":"URL of the Data Marketplace's metadata","type":"string"},"clientId":{"description":"Client ID of the Data Marketplace","type":"string"},"clientSecret":{"description":"Client Secret of the Data Marketplace","type":"string"}},"required":["baseUrl","clientId","clientSecret"],"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Data Marketplace Base Configurations updated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"baseConfigurations":{"properties":{"id":{"description":"ID","type":"string"},"baseUrl":{"description":"URL of the Data Marketplace's metadata","type":"string"},"clientId":{"description":"Client ID of the Data Marketplace","type":"string"},"clientSecret":{"description":"Client Secret of the Data Marketplace","type":"string"}},"required":["id","baseUrl","clientId","clientSecret"],"type":"object"}},"required":["baseConfigurations"]}}},"headers":{"Content-Type":{"schema":{"type":"json","example":"application/json"},"description":"Content-Type header"}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
